hackathon-description-text: Join up with game developers of all experience levels and prototype a game!
hackathon-eligibility:
Come to the new Microsoft Reactor at 680 Folsom in San Francisco at 6pm on Friday November 6th.
The event will take place between 6pm to Midnight on the 6th, 10am to Midnight on the 7th, and 10am to 4pm on the 8th.
At 2pm on Sunday, November 8th all work will stop, and we will begin showing off our work to other as well as sponsor prize juding/awards/wrap up ceremony.
hackathon-requirements: Any type of game is welcome! Web, mobile, tablet, desktop, even board/card/pen and paper games if you're so inclinded.
hackathon-rules:
Everyone is welcome, however the Indepdent Game Developers of Silicon Valley reserve the right to ask anyone to leave for any reaon. For example, any hate speech, or creating a hostile enviroment for other game jammers will not be tolerated.
Game jammers will be sent home between midnigth and 10am each night, no overnight stays allowed. Get some sleep! It's good for your health!
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=680 Folsom St, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Any prizes we have will be from sponsors, and thus will be subject to their criteria.

hackathon-location-address: 680 Folsom St, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA
hackathon-description-header: Create a new prototype game that could be the next big thing!
